mapper.select: SELECT E.enroll_id, E.resume, E.person_id, E.project_id, S.enroll_id as s_enroll_id, S.create_time as state_create_time, S.update_time as state_update_time, ST.enroll_state_type_id as st_enroll_state_type_id, ST.state_name FROM t_project_enroll E left outer join t_project_enroll_state S on E.enroll_id = S.enroll_id left outer join t_project_enroll_state_type ST on E.enroll_state_type_id = ST.enroll_state_type_id WHERE E.enroll_id=#{enrollId}
SELECT ST.enroll_state_type_id, ST.state_name FROM t_project_enroll E left outer join t_project_enroll_state_type ST on E.enroll_state_type_id = ST.enroll_state_type_id WHERE E.enroll_id=#{enrollId}

SELECT E.enroll_id, E.person_id as enroll_person_id, E.project_id as enroll_project_id, E.resume, E.create_time as enroll_create_time, E.update_time as enroll_update_time, E.on_delete as enroll_on_delete, P.project_id, P.project_name, P.project_abstract, P.school, P.academy, P.figure_path, P.academy, P.school, P.background, P.major, P.max_enroll_count, P.enrolled_count, P.create_time as project_create_time, P.update_time as project_update_time, P.on_delete as project_on_delete, S.enroll_id as s_enroll_id, S.enroll_state_type_id as s_enroll_state_type_id, S.create_time as state_create_time, S.update_time as state_update_time, ST.enroll_state_type_id as st_enroll_state_type_id, ST.state_name FROM t_project_enroll E left outer join t_project P on E.project_id = P.project_id left outer join t_project_enroll_state S on E.enroll_id = S.enroll_id left outer join t_project_enroll_state_type ST on S.enroll_state_type_id = ST.enroll_state_type_id WHERE E.person_id=#{personId} AND E.on_delete = 0 ORDER BY enroll_update_time DESC
limit #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT E.enroll_id, E.person_id as enroll_person_id, E.project_id as enroll_project_id, E.resume, E.create_time as enroll_create_time, E.update_time as enroll_update_time, E.on_delete as enroll_on_delete, P.person_id, P.name, P.nick_name, P.phone_number, P.academy, P.student_number, P.grade, P.profession, P.major, P.on_delete as student_on_delete, S.enroll_id as s_enroll_id, S.enroll_state_type_id as s_enroll_state_type_id, S.create_time as state_create_time, S.update_time as state_update_time, ST.enroll_state_type_id as st_enroll_state_type_id, ST.state_name FROM t_project_enroll E left outer join t_person P on E.person_id = P.person_id left outer join t_project_enroll_state S on E.enroll_id = S.enroll_id left outer join t_project_enroll_state_type ST on S.enroll_state_type_id = ST.enroll_state_type_id WHERE E.project_id=#{projectId} AND E.on_delete = 0 ORDER BY enroll_update_time DESC
limit #{offset},#{limit}
SELECT COUNT(project_id) FROM t_project_enroll WHERE person_id=#{personId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_project_enroll (project_id, person_id, resume) SELECT #{project.projectId}, #{person.personId}, #{resume} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT enroll_id FROM t_project_enroll E WHERE E.project_id=#{project.projectId} AND E.person_id=#{person.personId})
INSERT INTO t_project_enroll_state (enroll_id, enroll_state_type_id) SELECT #{enrollId}, ( SELECT enroll_state_type_id FROM t_project_enroll_state_type WHERE state_name=#{stateName} ) FROM DUAL
mapper.update: update t_project SET enrolled_count=enrolled_count+1 WHERE project_id=#{projectId}

update t_project_enroll_state SET enroll_state_type_id=( SELECT enroll_state_type_id FROM t_project_enroll_state_type WHERE state_name=#{stateName} ) WHERE enroll_id=( SELECT enroll_id FROM t_project_enroll WHERE project_id=#{projectId} AND person_id=#{personId} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(project_id) FROM t_project WHERE project_id=#{projectId} AND enrolled_count >= max_enroll_count

mapper.update: UPDATE t_project_enroll SET on_delete=1 WHERE enroll_id=#{enrollId}
